Submodules¶

thinkpol.reader.reader module¶

class thinkpol.reader.reader.Reader(file_name, format)¶

Bases: object

Reads information (about users and their snapshots) from a formatted binary file. A Reader object can be used as an iterable, going through all its snapshots.

Parameters

  • file_name (str) – name of the file

  • format (str) – format of the file (‘binary’ or ‘protobuf’)

Module contents¶

Reads information (about users and their snapshots) from a formatted binary file. Contains the ‘reader’ module that has a Reader object, and the ‘reader_drivers’ folder, which contains drivers for handling different file formats.

Thinkpol
